name: Arataki Ichiban
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Arataki Itto, equip this card.
After Arataki Itto equips this card, immediately use Fight Club Legend once.
After your Arataki Itto, who has this card equipped, uses Fight Club Legend for the second time or more in one Round: If Superlative Superstrength is triggered, deal +1 additional DMG.
(You must have Arataki Itto in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1605]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1605] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S16051]</color> once.
After your $[A1605], who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S16051]</color> for the second time or more in one Round: If $[K1007] is triggered, deal +1 additional DMG.
(You must have $[A1605] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Arataki Itto</color>, equip this card.
After Arataki Itto equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Fight Club Legend</color> once.
After your Arataki Itto, who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>Fight Club Legend</color> for the second time or more in one Round: If <color=#FFFFFFFF>Superlative Superstrength</color> is triggered, deal +1 additional DMG.
(You must have Arataki Itto in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
storytext: Whatever you do, remember to ride the momentum.
source: Reward for inviting Arataki Itto to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
